Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Now I know what you're thinking. Oh no! Thor's in a cage. How did this happen?  Well, sometimes you have to get captured just to get a straight answer out of somebody. It's a long story but basically I'm a bit of a hero. See, I spent some time on earth, fought some robots, saved the planet a couple of times. Then I went searching through the cosmos for some magic, colorful Infinity Stone things... didn't find any. That's when I came across a path of death and destruction which led me all the way here into this cage... where I met you.

Dialogue: The people trapped down there are all that matters. While I'm dealing with Hela, I need you two to help get everyone off Asgard.

Speaker: banner
Dialogue: How the hell are we supposed to do that?

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: I have a man on the ground.

Speaker: heimdall
Dialogue: Asgard. She's here.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Now the ship has guns.

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: I'll take it from here.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: I found this in the armory.

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: "Your majesty." Don't die.    You know what I mean.

Speaker: heimdall
Dialogue: We must keep moving! Go to the Bifrost!

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Sister.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: You're still alive.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: I love what you've done with the place. Redecorating, I see.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: It seems our father's solution to every problem was to cover it up.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Or to cast it out.  He told you you were worthy.   He said the same thing to me.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: You see, you never knew him, not at his best.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: I understand why you're angry. And you are my sister, and technically have a claim to the throne. And believe me, I would love for someone else to rule. But it can't be you. You're just...the worst.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: Okay, get up. You're in my seat.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: You know, Father once told me that a wise king never seeks out war.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: But must always be ready for it.

Speaker: heimdall
Dialogue: Go back!

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: To be honest, I expected more.

Speaker: skurge
Dialogue: Heimdall!    The sword!

Speaker: heimdall
Dialogue: We must cross now! To Bi-Frost!

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: Here's the difference between us. I'm Odin's firstborn, the rightful heir, the savior of Asgard.  And you're nothing.

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: This stupid dog won't die!

Speaker: banner
Dialogue: Everything's going to be okay. I got this. You want to know who I am?

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: What the hell are you talking about?

Speaker: banner
Dialogue: You'll see.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: You see? No one's going anywhere.  I'll get that sword even if I have to kill every single one of them to do it.

Speaker: korg
Dialogue: Hey man.   I'm Korg.   This is Miek.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: Your savior is here!

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: That little shit.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: Did you miss me?    Everybody on that ship, now.

Speaker: heimdall
Dialogue: Welcome home. I saw you coming.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: Of course you did.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: A valiant effort, but you never stood a chance.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: She's too strong.   Without my hammer I cannot--

Speaker: odin
Dialogue: Are you Thor, God of Hammers?

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: It's too late. She's already taken Asgard.

Speaker: odin
Dialogue: Asgard is not a place. Never has been.  This could be Asgard. It is wherever our people stand. And right now those people need you.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: I'm not as strong as you.

Speaker: odin
Dialogue: No.   You're stronger.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: Tell me brother, what were you the God of again...?

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: You're late.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: You're missing an eye.

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: This isn't over.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: I think we should disband the Revengers.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: Hit her with a lightning blast.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: I just hit her with the biggest lightning blast in the history of lightning. It did nothing.

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: We need to hold her off until everybody's on board.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: It won't end there. The longer Hela's on Asgard the more powerful she grows. She'll hunt us down. We need to stop her here and now.

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: What's our move?

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: I'm not doing "Get help."

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Asgard's not a place, it's a people.  Go to the vault. Surtur's crown. It's the only way.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: Bold move, brother. Even for me.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Shall we?

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: After you.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: This is madness.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: GO!   GO NOW!

Speaker: skurge
Dialogue: For Asgard.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: With the Eternal Flame, you are reborn.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: Whatever game you're playing, it won't work. You can't defeat me.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: No, but he can.

Speaker: hela
Dialogue: No...NO!

Speaker: surtur
Dialogue: Tremble before me Asgard, for I am your reckoning!

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: The people are safe.     That's all that matters.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: We're fulfilling the prophecy.

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: I hate this prophecy.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: So do I, but we have no choice.

Speaker: surtur
Dialogue: Surtur destroys Asgard, he destroys Hela so that our people can live.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: We need to let him finish...  No!

Speaker: hulk
Dialogue: But...big Monster.

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: Hulk! Let's go.

Speaker: hulk
Dialogue: Friends.

Speaker: surtur
Dialogue: I am Asgard's doom!!

Speaker: korg
Dialogue: The damage is not too bad. As long as the foundations are strong, we can rebuild this place. It will become a haven for all people and aliens of the universe...

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: What have I done?

Speaker: heimdall
Dialogue: You saved us from extinction. Asgard is not a place, it's a people.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Perhaps you're not so bad after all, brother.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: Maybe not.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Thank you, Loki.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: Do we have to hug now?

Speaker: valkyrie
Dialogue: Your throne.

Speaker: heimdall
Dialogue: So, King of Asgard.

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: I'm not sure. Any suggestions? Miek, what's your home planet?

Speaker: korg
Dialogue: Oh, Miek's dead. I accidentally stepped on him on the bridge, I've just felt so guilty I've been carrying him around all day...

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Earth it is.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: Do you really think it's a good idea to go back to Earth?

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Sure!   They love me there.

Speaker: loki
Dialogue: Let me rephrase: Do you really think it's a good idea to bring me back to Earth?

Speaker: thor
Dialogue: Probably not. But don't worry, brother...I've got a feeling that everything's going to work out.
